title: Business Center and Meeting Room, Laundry Closets, Microwaves
posting_body: ['4633 Campus Drive, Fort Worth, TX 76119', 'Campus Apartments brings you the best community amenities in the affordable apartment home industry.', 'Some of these include controlled gate access, a wonderful fitness center, and a helpful business center.', 'Cooling off in our shimmering swimming pool will feel great after a hard day’s work.', 'Be sure to sign up for a tour today and be one of the first to tour our brand new community.', 'Apartment Features:', 'Covered Patios or Balconies with Storage Closet', 'Washer and Dryer Connections', 'Water-conserving Fixtures', '9Ft Ceilings', 'Energy Star Appliances & Lighting', 'Laundry Closets', 'Community Features:', 'Business Center and Meeting Room', 'Covered Patio with Seating Area', 'Fitness Center', "Children's Play Area", 'Grill & Picnic Areas', 'Common Area Wi-Fi', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*Income restrictions apply, pricing and availability are subject to change daily.', 'Photos may not be of the exact advertised unit.', 'Please contact us today for the most up to date information!']
